name: hexjumper
text: A comment left by hexjumper was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, dullard, Scorpio_nadir, keithcozz, Boxus, Madoushi)

text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Pan-Optic, bluecarrot, Maledictis, Hexjumper, achilleselbow, yingkaixing, SotiCoto)

text: A comment left by envika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by bluecarrot, yingkaixing, SotiCoto)

name: c_dizzle
text: Yep.

name: greenkoolayd
text: your comment kills the strip so shut up, assface.

name: wehavemagnums
text:
THE HOG SHALL LIE WITH THE PRAWN
Ah, memories! This site is so great.

name: nathanielperson
text: It just occured to me how very unkosher that is.

name: saru
text: Are you sure it isn't like multiplying negatives? Maybe a crossbreed of a hog and a sea creature would cancel out the un-kosher qualities of each?

name: relaxing
text: The Levites would not be at all down with that.

name: dj_douche
text: awesome :)

name: cuddlefish
text: wait a minute

name: direhaggis
text: Ray spontaneously had a 'dance like you've got ass in your pants!' moment.

name: snatch22
text: The dude yelled so loud that he blew out his lights.  Awesome.

name: mortshire
text:
no, the evil he unleashed sucked every iota of light from the room.
classic.

name: ferdinand
text: no, the evil he unleashed went to target, bought a clapper, installed it, then clapped the lights off then on again.

name: invidious
text: Come now, everyone knows that evil shops at Walmart.

name: greenkoolayd
text: if i was concerned with being socially responsible, id be offended at that.

name: overmedicated
text: AAAIIIIIGHT!?

name: morganization
text: his horns and fangs are precious

name: hollis
text: Sort of a preview of Nice Pete and Lyle's band.

name: deancain29
text: he DOESNT have a clapper! what the hell people!

name: enginexsummer
text: YES

name: rotavele
text:
For some reason I'd always assumed that T had straight up lied about the clapper thing, but I guess it makes more sense that Rays voice killed the lights with his furor.

This is one of my favourite strips.

name: i_love_kate
text: I assumed that Téodor was just making up the clapper thing so that he could properly convey Ray's surprising loudness with a witticism.

name: deusoma
text: alt text is priceless: "Ray thinks that forgetting to jam for forty-five seconds merits a 'whoops'"

name: i_love_kate
text: So that's what Tekende was referencing!

name: tekende
text: i_love_kate thinks that discovering what tekende was referencing merits a "So that's what Tekende was referencing!"

name: mrectomy
text: The same 'whoops' that he offered when he accidentally turned Roast Beef into an icon for racism.

name: ojnabieoot
text: My favorite part is that in those forty-five seconds Ray had one single thought.

name: tbtabby
text: Was this the inspiration for Mister Band?

name: prufrock
text: whoops!

name: ovenface
text: oh wow! my feelings on this strip cannot be more pro.

name: bluecarrot
text: Does a really loud scream set off a clapper? This comic made me think about the mechanics of a clapper for the first time. Very nice.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: My date with Scarlet.

name: boopy
text: haha. "this week." as if a 5 second pause in bajo-playing will effect Teodor's week plans.

name: echidnaboy
text: 45 seconds. That's 0.000074 of a week Teodor will never get back.

name: chloraloner
text: Merits a "whoops" in my book.

name: thomgreenwood
text: "AAAIIIIIGHT?!" is such an evil thing to say.

name: hausea
text: I started to write a comment about how this was the only Achewood strip to make me hysterical with laughter, but I deleted it because I afraid the internet would judge me.

name: dj_douche
text: Wow Ray totally fugued right there in panel 7.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Fugue on a banjo? Nonsense!

name: dj_douche
text: oh, you've never tried it?

name: xud
text:
Reminds me of every death metal song out there.

AAAIIIIIGHT!?

name: greenkoolayd
text: ray 'corpsegrinder' smuckels has a nice ring to it.....

name: carlyle
text: I love how unnaffected Teodor is by everything. Just a little eyebrow lift in reaction to Ray screaming so loud lights blinked.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: T was impatient. Ray said wait a minute. (he did not actually say this.)

name: freakywonton
text: achewood at work is a dangerous activity to be doing, especially if work is a quiet environment.
